Dialogue.Text: Nice camp eh? But it's not enough, trust me.
Not against the [monsters] that come out when it gets dark.
Lately there haven't been many around, but even a few can be dangerous if you don't have a good [weapon] to fight them off.
I'm trying to build a shelter before nightfall, but chopping wood is exhausting work.
I left my axe in that stump over there to take a break.
Tell you what, if you chop me the wood I need I'll let you keep it.
